27.eng-name: Pilgrims Prevented from Completing the Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Whoever performs Hajj to this House (Ka`ba) and does not approach his wife for sexual relations nor commits sins (while performing Hajj), he will come out as sinless as a newlyborn child. (Just delivered by his mother)

chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah Ta'ala "... Nor commit sin nor dispute unjustly during Hajj ..."
